name: Skycade Core
description: A Minecraft server core specially designed for Skycade LTD. "SkycadeCore" was a proprietary software developed for Skycade LTD, a once-prominent Minecraft network with a substantial player base. As a core plugin, it excelled in delivering outstanding performance and quality to both players and staff. "SkycadeCore" seamlessly integrated with all other Skycade plugins and every server on the Minecraft network, providing a wide array of features that enhanced moderation and overall quality of life for all users during its operation.
